column3: Traffic;According to a report from the National Police
column4: a total of 52 traffic accidents have so far been confirmed in the country from September 27-29
column6: 28 minor injuries and 52 seriously injured.------ 66 motorcycles
column8: 3 big trucks were involved in the accidents and the causes  included: speed
column10: disregard and drunk driving. As the holiday is still not yet over
column11: and with many people returning from the provinces tonight and tomorrow
column12: this figure is expected to rise slightly. ------AREY NEWS------*Last year there were ------22 reported fatalities------ over the holiday peiod.
